9659.quoteText:
Users can optionally register for an account.
however, certain features are available for registered users only.
9659.title: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

tosdr.case: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

9661.quoteText:
This privacy policy will detail:

  1. What information Listudy collects
9661.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

9662.quoteText: Your information will only be disclosed if it is legally necessary to do so.
9662.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

tosdr.case: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

9663.quoteText: You can edit or delete your user provided informations at any time.
9663.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

9664.quoteText: Information you delete is deleted from the live site but remains in Listudy’ backups for up to one year.
9664.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

9665.quoteText: Collected information is stored on Listudy’ servers, which are hosted by DigitalOcean.
9665.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

9666.quoteText: You may choose to close your account at any time, for any reason.
9666.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

9668.quoteText: Translated terms of service shall only serve as an informal source of information.
9668.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

9669.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

9670.quoteText: Some of them need to be expressed in specific legal language but we’ve done our best to offer you clear and simple explanations of what everything means.
9670.title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read

9672.quoteText: To sign up for a Listudy account, you need to be 16 or over.
9672.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

9673.quoteText: If you don’t follow these rules, we reserve the right to close your account without warning.
9673.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

9674.quoteText: We use European Union data protection law as our baseline
9674.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

9675.quoteText: Listudy itself is also free/libre open-source software licensed under the GNU AGPL.
9675.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

tosdr.case: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

9676.quoteText: We won’t be responsible for the content you post.
9676.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

tosdr.case: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

9677.quoteText: In all circumstances, we may retain certain information as required by law or necessary for our legitimate operating purposes.
9677.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

9678.quoteText: We can make changes to the Listudy Site and Services without letting you know in advance, or being liable for any loss, damage, or harm that arises as a result.
9678.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

tosdr.case: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

9679.quoteText: We can cancel accounts, or decline to let Users use our Services.
9679.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

9680.quoteText: You retain your rights to any content you submit, post or create through the services including chess games.
9680.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data

9696.quoteText: whether the services will meet your requirements
9696.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

tosdr.case: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

9697.quoteText: or be available on an uninterrupted, secure or error-free basis.
9697.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
